title: SACO DE PÃO
content:
Friends.  
I created this font and I want to know your critics on this work.  
Thank you.

Marcio  
 [contato@fabrikadetypos.com.br](mailto:contato@fabrikadetypos.com.br)  
 [www.fabrikadetypos.com.br](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419063610/http:/www.fabrikadetypos.com.br/ "www.fabrikadetypos.com.br")

author: mhirosse

comments.content: This font's style may come back but it's out of fashion at the moment. That's why there have not been any responses I think. If you want to challenge this, I suggest that you set something in the type face to help make a case for why it should exist.
